In the aftermath of Hurricane Laura, AMERISAFE employees 
helped to clean up Bryant Park in our hometown of 
DeRidder, LA, doing everything from painting playground 
equipment, clearing debris, to weed maintenance.Employees stepped up to provide Christmas presents 
to local children through Toys for Tots during the 2021 
holiday season.COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT
AMERISAFE’s sales team, along with safety and 
communications team members, helped restore wetlands at 
Galveston Bay Foundation, planting some 600 plants and 
making a monetary donation.
In honor of Insurance Careers Month (February) 
AMERISAFE donates to each local Future Business 
Leaders of America (FBLA) chapters. Our Vice President 
of Human Resources and Payroll presented the check to 
the Rosepine High School FBLA chapter.
